entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [android] trimmer warning for `System.Private.CoreLib.dll` #100256
  • NullabilityInfoContext is not thread-safe #100254
  • [browser][MT] Process terminated assert handling #100249
    9.0.0
  • Test `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly.Tests` stack overflowing in Windows x64 release for `libraries-pgo` pipeline #100246
  • JIT: `_Sse41_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.X86._Sse41.Program.RoundToNearestIntegerSingle()` failed in `jitpartialcompilation_pgo` for linux x64 #100245
  • [API Proposal]: Default SearchValues character classes #100244
  • iOS: Breakpoint not hit in classes containing static fields that are initialized inline #100243
  • yieldprocessornormalized appears to be incorrect in some scenarios #100242
  • [apple][HybridGlobalization] Enable more System.Globalization.Tests for Apple Hybrid-Globalization #100240
    9.0.0
  • Synchronous call inside XDocument.LoadAsync #100239
  • mono_jit_compile_method_jit_only failed #100237
    9.0.0
  • Disabling Blazor SIMD support breaks published app during runtime when AOT=false during publish #100234
    9.0.0
  • How to config the AOT compilation process #100232
    9.0.0
  • NegotiateStream fails when authenticating from linux client to windows server #100231
  • FileStream Flush(true) significant performance degradation in .NET 8 when buffer size is bigger than the payload #100229
  • [NAOT][Apple] NativeAOT TrimmingBehaviors smoke tests failing on apple mobile #100226
  • [mono] System.IO.Tests.MemoryStreamTests.MemoryStream_SeekOverflow_Throws OOM on windows-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono #100225
  • [mono][android] Failures in System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildChainForSelfSignedCertificate_* #100224
  • Non-blittable struct with explicit layout has wrong managed size #100220
  • Test failure System.Net.Quic.QuicException : The connection timed out from inactivity. #100219
  • Test failure: baseservices/RuntimeConfiguration/TestConfigTester/TestConfigTester.dll #100217
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessTests.CanBeFinalized #100216
  • riscv64 builds fail with "No usable version of clang found." error #100215

Closed

  • Blazor debug proxy and Mono proxy should generate ETL events #38285
  • Trying to statically link libc with NativeAOT causes a fatal crash in the linker #100230
  • Does this work with .NET 8? #98235
  • DEREF_OF_NULL.EX at runtime/src/coreclr/vm/zapsig.cpp #100209
  • Stateless Managed->Unmanaged marshaller does not call GetPinnableReference #96932
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToHGlobalUTF8 is declared as private, but the rest of UTF-8 functions in Marshal are public #99886
  • System.Text.Json 7.0.2 fails to load in a .net6 application. #93780
  • Assertion failed 'lastBlockILEndOffset < beginOffs' #100125
    9.0.0
  • Error exporting https certificate on macOS Sonoma 14.4 #99735
    9.0.0
  • Half.ToString fails for highest precision #98841
  • Unable to run dotnet runtime on linux-musl-x86 #100223
  • CONTRACT_VIOLATION during runtime startup on main #100236
  • [NativeAOT] System.Runtime.Tests occasionally crashes on linux-arm-NativeAOT #99079
  • DEREF_AFTER_NULL.EX in src/coreclr/vm/readytoruninfo.cpp #100208
  • .NET 8 Preview 7 Blazor WebAssembly PWA, not working on iPhone & iPad #90710
    8.0.0
  • [Wasm][Interp] mono_raise_exception implementation problems #99366
  • How to Obtain a Method Pointer Without Reflection in NativeAOT? #100103
  • [NATIVEAOT] lld duplicate symbol compilation error when building for linux-bionic-arm #100191

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow trimming FeatureGuard and FeatureSwitchDefinition attributes #100263
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add peephole for reversing condition and removing false jump #100262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Build Subset Help Not Displaying #100261
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Process.OSX: fix thread safety #100260
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Support building against clang 18 #100258
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Config generator emits lambdas for error path that force allocation on success path #100257
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • The layout of the `ITypeLib2` interface is incorrect. #100255
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Data Descriptor Spec #100253
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [browser][MT] mono_wasm_schedule_synchronization_context #100251
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • remove test references to obsolete OSes #100247
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Reenable C4242 and C4244 warnings in libunwind #100241
    Security, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] reduce use of wrap_error_root #100233
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delay MsQuicSendBuffers disposal to QuicStream safe handle closing. #100228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [WIP][Mono][infra] Disable failing tests/pipelines on runtime-extra-platforms #100227
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Simplify floating point mod and round jit helpers implementations #100222
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Call the Copy Constructor for stack arguments in C++/CLI on x86 #100221
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Switch from array to collection expression in OidLookup #100252
    area-System.Security
  • Avoid IDE030X suggestions for collection expressions that could change semantics/perf #100250
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Remove remaining SVE references from emitarm64.cpp #100100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Delete ENCODE_FIELD_SIG_IndexInsteadOfToken #100214
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Set `bbCodeOffsEnd` to BAD_IL_OFFSET when expanding static init calls #100152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Populate JsonPropertyInfo.AttributeProvider in the source generator. #100173
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Fix HalfNumberBufferLength #100187
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add a uniform representation for parameter ABI information #100138
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete RequiresProcessIsolation on some tests #100172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] disable jiterp + enable safe points #100156
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Remove ldr/str stack var tests (#100101) #100153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add templated register encoding methods #100081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Avoid 0-length array allocation for empty Distinct/Union.ToArray #100218
    area-System.Linq
  • Update CodeAnalysis config to include recently-added rules #100146
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Remove unused assembly files #100201
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.58, windows: 123.0.6312.58 #100084
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix RhGetCurrentThunkContext/RhCommonStub on linux-bionic-arm #100192
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update VS install requirements to bump Windows 10 SDK version #100170
    area-Meta, 9.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT/win-x86: Enable FEATURE_EH_CALLFINALLY_THUNKS #99718
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Prevent hoisting nodes with order side effects #100160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Improve collided exception performance #100169
    NO-REVIEW, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • JIT: initial work on general count reconstruction #99992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, tenet-performance, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Initialize values for yield normalization during startup #99991
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Clean up some call multi-reg ret handling #99679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove `GT_MKREFANY` #100204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NOREVIEW] Run HTTP3 stress with Adress sanitization #100023
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100168
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable FEATURE_PERFMAP on OSX, and update perfjitdump.cpp to work on OSX #99986
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #99584
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #99586
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use clang --version to get Apple toolset version #100199
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] handle exceptions #100148
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] [net7] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #100063
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 7.0.x
  • Provide System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow package readme #99664
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [wasm] use sbrk instead of emscripten mmap or malloc when loading bytes into heap #100106
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Include versions and checksums in VMR publishing #100004
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • TypeName parsing API #100094
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Move `GenerateJSModuleManifest` from pack to sdk #99675
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, arch-riscv
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Revert to full `NativeName` by interop with JS #99956
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Convert most of variant to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ci] Fix Playwright test times out/fails because target closed #100074
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Redesign the frame layout to avoid the redundant computation of the stackOffsets #99278
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Deduplicate header Separator logic #100179
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser][ws] Do not duplicate code executed in `local_on_close` #99685
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser][wbt] Debug InnerSendMessageToServerAsync #100182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [release/9.0-preview3] Revert #99140 #100147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build win-x86 NativeAOT runtime pack #100195
    NO-MERGE, arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use number of slots intead of size in BuildBlockStore #100206
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • Make delegates immutable #99200
    area-VM-coreclr
